title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit named Frodo Baggins inherits a powerful ring and must journey across Middle-earth to destroy it before it falls into the hands of the evil Lord Sauron.

title: Iron Man
description: Billionaire businessman Tony Stark is kidnapped and forced to build a devastating weapon, but instead he creates a high-tech suit of armor and escapes to become the superhero Iron Man.

title: Thor
description: The mighty Thor is banished from Asgard to Earth, where he must learn to live among humans while facing his brother Loki and protecting the world from a cosmic threat.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
description: Steve Rogers, a scrawny young man, volunteers for an experimental program that transforms him into the super-soldier Captain America, who fights against the criminal organization HYDRA during World War II.

title: The Avengers
description: The Avengers unite to fight against Loki and an alien army that threatens to destroy Earth.

title: Iron Man 3
description: Tony Stark battles an enemy who knows everything about him, while dealing with his own internal demons and facing the consequences of being a superhero.

title: Thor: The Dark World
description: Thor fights to save the Nine Realms from a dark enemy who threatens to destroy the universe.

title: Ant-Man
description: Ex-con Scott Lang is recruited by a mentor to become Ant-Man and protect the secret behind the technology that gives him the ability to shrink in size but increase in strength.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
description: The Avengers fight against Ultron, a robotic villain who seeks to eradicate humanity.

title: Captain America: Civil War
description: Captain America and Iron Man lead opposing sides in the battle for control of superhero technology, while a new threat arises.

title: Doctor Strange
description: Surgeon Stephen Strange seeks a cure for his injured hands from a car accident and discovers a world of magic and alternative dimensions.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: Two sisters move to the countryside and discover a world of friendly spirits, including Totoro, a forest spirit who helps them cope with their new environment.

title: Spirited Away
description: Chihiro and her parents stumble upon a seemingly abandoned amusement park. After her parents are turned into pigs, Chihiro must navigate a magical world filled with strange creatures and find a way to save her parents and escape.

title: Princess Mononoke
description: A young warrior, Ashitaka, becomes embroiled in a conflict between the forest gods and the humans who consume their resources, and he must find a way to restore the balance between the two.

title: Howl's Moving Castle
description: Sophie, a young girl who works in a hat shop, is cursed by a witch and transformed into an old woman. She seeks refuge in the moving castle of the wizard Howl, and together they embark on a journey to break the curse.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
description: Kiki, a young witch, moves to a seaside town to begin her training and starts a delivery service using her broomstick. Along the way, she makes new friends and learns to become independent.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
description: Captain America teams up with Black Widow to expose a dark conspiracy while fighting against a mysterious assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
